name: floatcmp
description: floatcmp can be used to compare float values to each other, to validate the comparison.

params_body.name: oper1
params_body.description: The first float value to compare.

params_body.name: oper2
params_body.description: The second float value to compare.

return_values: 0 if value does match, 1 if the first value is bigger and -1 if the 2nd value is bigger.
pawn_code:
floatcmp(2.0, 2.0); // Returns 0 because they match.
floatcmp(1.0, 2.0) // Returns -1 because the second value is bigger.
floatcmp(2.0, 1.0) // Returns 1 because the first value is bigger.
